name: Star Trader
overview: Star Trader is an Action game, developed and published by Falcom, which was released in Japan in 1989. As ace pilot Kain, you’re approached by a young girl named Lefi, who has some kind of mysterious seal. It’s your job to fly around the star system and uncover whatever mysteries need to be solved. Star Trader combines elements of an adventure game with shoot-em-up segments. As you reach new space stations, you’re granted more money, which in turn can be used to buy new weapons for your ship.
